description:
Maruko thinks about her friendship with Tamae when her dad gets in a fight with his best friend. Later, Maruko and her school friends all go to Hanawa`s house to learn to play darts (and get yummy snacks).
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Hiroshi no Yuujou, Maruko no Yuujou" no Maki / "Maruko, Darts o Yaritai" no Maki
Hiroshi`s Friendship, Maruko`s Friendship / Maruko Wants to Play Darts
「ヒロシの友情, まる子の友情」の巻 / 「まる子, ダーツをやりたい」の巻
